# Syllabus

Welcome to the course website for STAT 230, Introduction to Data Science. To begin, you can find the course syllabus linked below:

- [Click here](syllabus230s26.html) to view the course syllabus

You can locate course content by scrolling, or by using the navigation bar in the upper left.  

Please note: material will not be posted until we've reached that point in the course.

### Links to R Installations

1) Install R (https://cran.r-project.org/)
2) Install RStudio (https://posit.co/download/rstudio-desktop/)
